Submodules¶

Experiments.evaluate_model module¶

class Experiments.evaluate_model.EvaluateModel(task_ids)¶

Bases: object

evaluate_model()¶

Returns a dictionary of errors indexed by task identifiers where each element denotes the error for that task on the test set.

:return dictionary of test errors

load_data()¶

Loads the test dataset.

load_dummy_data()¶

Loads the dummy test dataset.

load_model(model_file, model_class)¶

Loads the model from the given checkpoint file.

Parameters:
  • model_file – The checkpoint file from which the model should be loaded.
  • model_class – The Model class or any of its child classes.

Experiments.experiment module¶

class Experiments.experiment.Experiment(task_ids, x_train, x_validate, x_test, y_train, y_validate, y_test, model_class, expt_name, learning_rate, batch_size, num_epochs)¶

Bases: object

initialize_network()¶

Initializes the DNN network :return: None

train()¶

Trains the network :return: None

Experiments.experiment.dummy(args)¶

Runs the pipeline on a small synthetic dataset. :param args: Command line arguments parsed with argpase. :return: None

Experiments.experiment.main(args)¶

Runs the pipeline on the Million Songs Data set. :param args: Command-line arguments parsed with argparse. :return: None
